channel.title: The Ricoshay Mixtape / The Barbershop Project (iPod)
channel.description: A collection of audio and video from UK label, Ricoshay.net. A talent roster featuring Hip-Hop's "C4" charged and ready to detonate; @Eneeks, @RyzHope, @ricoshaycouk and more to come. Be a part of the growing league of followers of the new audio treasure!

image.title: The Ricoshay Mixtape / The Barbershop Project (iPod)

channel.itunes:summary: A collection of audio and video from UK label, Ricoshay.net. A talent roster featuring Hip-Hop's "C4" charged and ready to detonate; @Eneeks, @RyzHope, @ricoshaycouk and more to come. Be a part of the growing league of followers of the new audio treasure!
channel.itunes:keywords: uk hip hop, rap, eneeks, ryan hope, mistir_d, freakus, kuttable kay, the ricoshay redemption, the barbershop project, drake, wale, cory gunz, mickey factz, charles hamilton, kanye west, lupe fiasco, the kool kidz, m.i.a, 2 pac, the notorious b.i.g, jay-z, nas, wu tang clan, a tribe called quest, new rappers, new hip hop stars, estelle, neo soul, asher roth

item.title: Episode 24
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary: A sneak preview of Ryz Hope's next mixtape, "Gateway to gearz". "Gold" is a track featuring a verse from Skin Teet Jones (@ricoshaycouk). Connect with Ryz Hope at twitter.com/ryzhope
item.description: A sneak preview of Ryz Hope's next mixtape, "Gateway to gearz". "Gold" is a track featuring a verse from Skin Teet Jones (@ricoshaycouk). Connect with Ryz Hope at twitter.com/ryzhope

item.title: Episode 23
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary: Wonderwall Runaway. Taken from Eneeks' current mixtape, "Life As I Know It". http://eneeks.bandcamp.com/
item.description: Wonderwall Runaway. Taken from Eneeks' current mixtape, "Life As I Know It". http://eneeks.bandcamp.com/

item.title: Episode 22
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary: The He Said She Said Marathon. Taken from Eneeks' current mixtape, "Life As I Know It". http://eneeks.bandcamp.com/
item.description: The He Said She Said Marathon. Taken from Eneeks' current mixtape, "Life As I Know It". http://eneeks.bandcamp.com/

item.title: Episode 21
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary: "The Love Scientist". Taken from Eneeks new mixtspe, "Life as I Know It" available at eneeks.bandcamp.com. The features Eneeks rapping over the Scientist instrumental made famous by Coldplay.
item.description: "The Love Scientist". Taken from Eneeks new mixtspe, "Life as I Know It" available at eneeks.bandcamp.com. The features Eneeks rapping over the Scientist instrumental made famous by Coldplay.

item.title: Episode 20
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary: From the Illustrater archives. A radio dub (jingle) for uk DJs Ace & Invisible featuring vocals of Ryz Hope & Skin Teet Jones (formerly Mistir_D). Hard raps over a beat produced by Skin Teet Jones. Enjoy.
item.description: From the Illustrater archives. A radio dub (jingle) for uk DJs Ace & Invisible featuring vocals of Ryz Hope & Skin Teet Jones (formerly Mistir_D). Hard raps over a beat produced by Skin Teet Jones. Enjoy.

item.title: EPISODE 19
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary: This one is a real treat. An Illustraters "Prestyle" over a Kanye West beat. Featuring vocals from Ryz Hope, Eneeks, Skin Teet Jones, & Mr Freakus. The finest of the Ricoshay roster go in hard on this fast paced posse cut.
item.description: This one is a real treat. An Illustraters "Prestyle" over a Kanye West beat. Featuring vocals from Ryz Hope, Eneeks, Skin Teet Jones, & Mr Freakus. The finest of the Ricoshay roster go in hard on this fast paced posse cut.

item.title: Episode 18
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary: A short story rap from Skin Teet Jones, formally known as Mistir_D. High potency for a two minute track. Something big is on the horizon!
item.description: A short story rap from Skin Teet Jones, formally known as Mistir_D. High potency for a two minute track. Something big is on the horizon!

item.title: EPISODE 17
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary: A potent, action packed rap from Skin Teet Jones, formally known as Mistir_D. The track is only 1:20 but the way he is rapping you'll think it goes on for longer!
item.description: A potent, action packed rap from Skin Teet Jones, formally known as Mistir_D. The track is only 1:20 but the way he is rapping you'll think it goes on for longer!

item.title: EPISODE 16
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary: A freestyle from Ryz Hope called the wireless age. Also featured on The Postman mixtape. For more freestyles from Ryz hope, check out the Hopestation on Youtube.
item.description: A freestyle from Ryz Hope called the wireless age. Also featured on The Postman mixtape. For more freestyles from Ryz hope, check out the Hopestation on Youtube.

item.title: Episode 10
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary: Another collaboration from the Eneeks and DJ E.C series. This time Eneeks drops some memorizing verses on a soulful house track. Hope you like it!!

item.title: Episode 7
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary:
Due to the great response from Eneeks' verse on episode 5, Mike Aryo & Biz decided to shoot a quick video adding cool visuals to a cool flow. Enjoy!
www.myspace.com/thericoshayredemption http://twitter.com/ricoshaycouk

item.title: RYAN HOPE BARBERSHOP PROJECT
item.itunes:author: ricoshayredemption
item.itunes:summary: The long awaited debut album from Ryan Hope is due 2009. Until then be sure to check out snippets from “Fundraisers”.
item.description: The long awaited debut album from Ryan Hope is due 2009. Until then be sure to check out snippets from “Fundraisers”.
